maqras.text: “Lemekeza dzina la Mbuye wako Wapamwambamwamba (ndikuliyeretsa ku zinthu zosayenera)
“Kupatula chimene wafuna Allah (kuti uchiiwale); ndithu Iye amadziwa zoonekera ndi zimene zimabisika
“(Palibe chikaiko ulalikiwo) aukumbukira (ndikuthandizidwa nawo) amene akuopa Allah
“Ndipo wamavuto ambiri, (wamakani ndi wokanira), adzitalikitsa ndi ulalikiwo
“Amene adzalowa ku moto waukulu (umene wakonzedwa kuti udzakhale malipiro ake)
“Ndipo sakafa m’menemo (ndikupumula kumazunzo), ndiponso sakakhala ndi moyo (wamtendere)
“Ndikukumbukira dzina la Mbuye wake (ndi mtima wake, ndi lirime lake) uku akumapemphera
“Koma inu mukukonda kwambiri moyo wa dziko lapansi
“Pamene moyo wa tsiku lachimaliziro ndiwabwino kwambiri ndiponso wamuyaya
“Ndithu izi (mukuuzidwa m’Qur’an) zilipo m’mabuku oyamba, akale
“Kodi yakudzera, (iwe Mtumiki) (s.a.w) nkhani ya Qiyâma (imene idzaphimba anthu ndi zoopsa zake)
“Zidzakondwera ndi malipiro a zochita zake (za pa dziko lapansi)
“Kodi (akunyozera kulingalira zisonyezo za Allah), sakulingalira kungamira idalengedwa motani
“Ndi thambo (limene akuliona nthawi zonse) m’mene lidatukulidwira (kutali popanda mzati)
“Ndithu kobwerera kwawo ndi kwa Ife basi
“Ndipo ndithu kuwerengedwa kwawo kuli kwa Ife
“Ndi masiku khumi (a mwezi wa Dhul-Hijjah omwe ngopatulika kwa Allah)
“Ndi Shaf’i ndi Witri: (nambala yogawika ndi yosagawika)
“Ndi usiku pamene ukupita (chifukwa cha kuyenda kwa dziko kodabwitsa)
“Kodi m’zimene zatchulidwazi simuli kulumbira kokwanira, kwa munthu wa nzeru
“Kodi sudadziwe momwe Mbuye wako adawalangira Âdi (anthu a mneneri Hûd)
“Ndi Asamudu, (anthu a mneneri Swaleh) amene adali kudula matanthwe ku chigwa (chotchedwa Wadi Qura ndi kumamanga nyumba zikuluzikulu)
“Komanso Firiauna (Farawo) mwini magulu ankhondo (omwe amalimbikitsa ufumu wake monga momwe zichiri zimalimbikitsira tenti)
“Choncho Mbuye wako adawathira ndi mitundu ya zilango (zoopsa)
“Ndithu Mbuye wako ali tcheru (ndi zochita za anthu. Ndipo akuwasungira kuti adzawalipire)
“Pamene munthu Mbuye wake akumuyesa (mayeso) ndikumulemekeza ndi kumpatsa mtendere (wachuma, ulemelero ndi mphamvu) amanena monyada: Mbuye wanga wandilemekeza (chifukwa zimenezi nzondiyenera ine)
“Koma akamuyesa mayeso ndi kumchepetsera rizq lake, (chuma) amanena (motaya rntima): Mbuye wanga wandinyoza
“Sichoncho ayi, (monga momwe mukuganizira) koma inu simuchitira za ufulu ana amasiye
“Ndipo mukudya chuma cha masiye; kudya kosusuka
“Ndikubwera Mbuye wako (mmabweredwe omwe akuwadziwa Iye Mwini) ndi angelo ali mmizeremizere
“Ndi kubweretsedwa Jahannam pa tsikulo, basi tsiku limenelo munthu adzakumbukira, koma kukumbuka kumeneko kudzamthandiza chiyani
“Adzanena: Kalanga ine! Ndikadatsogoza zabwino pa za moyo wanga uno
“Motero patsikuli, palibe wina amene adzalange monga momwe (Allah) adzalangire
“Ndiponso sanganjate aliyense monga kunjata kwa iye (Allah)
“Bwerera kwa Mbuye wako uli wokondwera (ndi zomwe wapatsidwa), ndipo uli woyanjidwa (ndi Allah pa zomwe udatsogoza)
“Ndipo lowa m’munda Wanga (mnyumba ya mtendere wa muyaya)
